title: Calculate Alpha Diversity Metrics — alpha.div
text: function used calculate multiple alpha diversity metrics one go. calculates Shannon Index, Simpson Index, Pielou Index, sample richness

title: Calculate Alpha Diversity Metrics — alpha.div
text: data Data table sample IDs first column sample.col Column name containing sample identifiers

title: Calculate Alpha Diversity Metrics — alpha.div
text: data frame containing associated alpha diversity metrics samples provided table.

title: QR Code Generation — generate.qr
text: Generates QR code given website URL saves SVG file.

title: QR Code Generation — generate.qr
code: generate.qr(site, filename, path = paste0(getwd(), "/plots/svg"), show = FALSE)

title: QR Code Generation — generate.qr
text: site URL website generate QR code . filename Name saved SVG file containing QR code. include ".svg" name. path Path QR SVG saved. Defaults "svg" sub-directory within "plots" directory. show Determines generated SVG immediately opened. Defaults FALSE.

what: Create a Boxplot with Points — quick.boxplot
title: Create a Boxplot with Points — quick.boxplot
text: Generate boxplot points. Data must structured x, y, grouping variables separate columns.

title: Create a Boxplot with Points — quick.boxplot
code: quick.boxplot(   data,   x.var,   y.var,   group.var = NULL,   facet.var = NULL,   post.hoc = "dunn_test",   ns.comp = TRUE,   adj.method = "BH",   x.lab = deparse(substitute(x.var)),   y.lab = deparse(substitute(y.var)),   color.lab = deparse(substitute(group.var)) )

title: Create a Boxplot with Points — quick.boxplot
text: data Data frame table used plotting. x.var Variable used x axis. y.var Continuous variable used y axis. group.var Variable used grouping color. Default none. facet.var Variable used creating facets plotted together. need included one. post.hoc Statistical test used determining significance groups. Default Dunn's test. Allowable methods rstatix R package: "wilcox_test", "t_test", "sign_test", "dunn_test", "emmeans_test", "tukey_hsd", "games_howell_test". ns.comp TRUE significant comparisons shown, FALSE comparisons shown. adj.method set "none", significant unadjusted p.values shown. adj.method Method used p value adjustment across p.values present plot. Default Benjamini-Hochburg. Allowable methods 'p.adjust'. x.lab X axis label. y.lab Y axis label color.lab Color label.

title: Create a Boxplot with Points — quick.boxplot
text: ggplot object.

what: Simultaneous GGPlot Save as PDF, PNG, SVG — save.ggplot
title: Simultaneous GGPlot Save as PDF, PNG, SVG — save.ggplot
text: function saves specified plots built using ggplot2 png, pdf, svg files. can specify subfolders data subset store plots however want plot directory.

title: Simultaneous GGPlot Save as PDF, PNG, SVG — save.ggplot
code: save.ggplot(   filename,   plot = last_plot(),   path = paste0(getwd(), "/plots"),   height = NA,   width = NA )

title: Simultaneous GGPlot Save as PDF, PNG, SVG — save.ggplot
text: filename want saved plot named plot Name plot object saved path Path designated plot folder. subfolders built plot file type. height Plot height width Plot width

title: guzior 0.1.3
text: Removed cb.pal.rda /data resolve error R-CMD-check. Changed title clarity. Added index packages ’ve found helpful.

title: guzioR 0.1.2
text: qr.gen() renamed generate.qr() avoid S3 method warning longer defaults displaying generated svg. cp.cols, three.col moved guzior.pal since ’re designed purposely colorblind friendly. paired6.col added palette group guzior.pal, includes light/dark pairs colors differentiating within set grouping variable. cb.pal removed reinvent wheel. several packages available include colorblind-friendly palettes, viridis package.

title: guzioR 0.1.1
text: Created guzioR hex. Added quick.boxplot() function. cb.pal used colorblind friendly palettes instead guzior.pal.

title: guzioR 0.1.0
text: Initial commit.
